name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Buck Cheap - South Africa Price Tracker

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We track the price of items so you can make better informed decisions on what to buy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track prices from your favourite retailers! After installing look for our price history graph when browsing products!

Currently supported retailers:

• Takealot
• Makro
• GeeWiz
• Woolworths
• Game
• Yuppiechef

Stay tuned as we continually expand our list of supported retailers to enhance your online shopping journey!
